issue.title: [JAVA] Nullable Value Vectors should extend BaseValueVector instead of BaseDataValueVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-276](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-276). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently Nullable Vectors have an unused data vector because of this.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-276?focusedCommentId=16102193) by Siddharth Teotia (siddteotia):*
PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/892 has been created.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-276?focusedCommentId=16105889) by Steven Phillips (sphillips):*
Issue resolved by pull request 892
